channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 星展银行拟增持深圳银行股份
item.description: DBS Group Holdings said on Friday it was raising its stake in China's Shenzhen Rural Commercial Bank in a S$376 million ($284.72 million) deal, as it looks to tap into growing opportunities in the Greater China region.翻译:星展集团控股公司周五表示，它将以 3.76 亿新元（合 2.8472 亿美元）的交易增持中国深圳农村商业银行的股份，以期抓住大中华地区不断增长的机遇。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 习近平敦促中国使节打造“外交铁军”
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday urged Chinese ambassadors to forge a "diplomatic iron army" loyal to the Communist Party, reviving the abrasive "Wolf Warrior" rhetoric propagated by some diplomats as a sign of China's increasingly assertive foreign policy.翻译:中国国家主席习近平周五敦促中国大使打造一支忠于共产党的“外交铁军”，重提一些外交官宣扬的粗暴“战狼”言论，以此作为中国日益自信的外交政策的标志。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: EDP​​将回购1GW风电投资组合49%的股份
item.description: Energias de Portugal said on Friday that its renewables unit EDP Renovaveis would buy back a 49% stake in its former wind portfolios in Portugal, Poland and Italy from two ACE funds sponsored by Chinese utility China Three Gorges.翻译:葡萄牙能源公司周五表示，其可再生能源子公司EDP Renovaveis将从中国公用事业公司中国三峡集团赞助的两只ACE基金手中回购其在葡萄牙、波兰和意大利的前风电投资组合中49%的股份。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国想遏制中国芯片产业。这家初创公司表明它并不容易
item.description: Last year, a veteran Silicon Valley software executive took the helm of a startup in his native China, company records show. The startup told potential investors it would sell microchip design software that is mostly available from just a handful of large Western companies.翻译:公司记录显示，去年，一位资深的硅谷软件高管在他的祖国中国掌管了一家初创公司。这家初创公司告诉潜在投资者，它将出售微芯片设计软件，这些软件主要由少数西方大型公司提供。
item.author: John Shiffman, Joshua Schneyer

item.title: 具有南海背景的中国前海军总长被任命为国防部长
item.description: China named former Navy chief Dong Jun as its new defence minister on Friday to replace the last minister who disappeared from public view four months ago.翻译:中国周五任命前海军总长董军为新任国防部长，以取代四个月前从公众视野中消失的最后一位国防部长。
item.author: Yew Lun Tian, Laurie Chen

item.title: 京东胜诉阿里巴巴反垄断诉讼
item.description: Chinese online retailer JD.com said on Friday that it won a lawsuit against rival Alibaba , which was fined 1 billion yuan ($140.68 million) for monopolistic practices.翻译:中国在线零售商京东周五表示，它赢得了对竞争对手阿里巴巴的诉讼，阿里巴巴因垄断行为被罚款 10 亿元人民币（1.4068 亿美元）。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英伟达为中国推出新游戏芯片以遵守美国出口管制
item.description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia on Thursday launched a modified version of an advanced gaming chip designed to comply with U.S. export controls targeting China.翻译:美国芯片制造商英伟达周四推出了先进游戏芯片的改进版本，旨在遵守美国针对中国的出口管制。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国的烟花爆竹禁令在农历新年前引发激烈争论
item.description: Chinese lawmakers on Friday weighed in on a fiery online debate on whether fireworks should be used to ring in the Lunar New Year in February, saying a total ban on pyrotechnics in the country credited with inventing them would be hard to implement.翻译:中国立法者周五在网上就是否应该用烟花爆竹来迎接二月农历新年的激烈争论进行了讨论，称在发明烟花爆竹的中国全面禁止烟花爆竹将很难实施。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国对咖啡的新需求引发了咖啡馆的激烈竞争
item.description: Chinese coffee consumption is growing quickly, spurring cut-throat competition between local and foreign coffee chains that have opened thousands of branded shops in recent months and surpassed the number of coffee stores in the United States.翻译:中国的咖啡消费量快速增长，引发了本地和外国咖啡连锁店之间的激烈竞争，近几个月来，这些咖啡连锁店开设了数千家品牌店，超过了美国的咖啡店数量。
item.author: Casey Hall, Marcelo Teixeira

item.title: 随着能源价格下跌，2023 年可可和铁矿石价格将强劲上涨
item.description: Cocoa and iron ore prices surged in 2023, while natural gas and coal prices tumbled, with most agricultural products expected to outperform energy and industrial metals in the New Year amid supply constraints and dry weather.翻译:2023年可可和铁矿石价格飙升，而天然气和煤炭价格暴跌，由于供应紧张和天气干燥，预计大多数农产品在新年的表现将优于能源和工业金属。
item.author: Naveen Thukral, Florence Tan

item.title: 波音称中国航空公司将于2023年恢复运营所有737 MAX
item.description: All Boeing 737 MAX jets operated by Chinese carriers are back in service at the end of 2023, the U.S. planemaker's China head said on Friday, nearly a year after they started flying following a global grounding in 2019.翻译:这家美国飞机制造商中国区负责人周五表示，中国航空公司运营的所有波音 737 MAX 喷气式飞机将于 2023 年底恢复运营，距 2019 年全球停飞后开始飞行已近一年。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国雾霾天气，新年旅客做好应对潜在干扰的准备
item.description: Year-end holidaymakers across China were bracing for possible transport disruptions after the weather bureau on Friday warned that heavy fog and haze would shroud areas from Hebei province in the north to southern Shanghai for more than 24 hours.翻译:气象局周五警告称，从北部的河北省到上海南部的地区将被大雾霾笼罩超过24小时，中国各地的年终度假者正准备应对可能的交通中断。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 美元自2020年以来首次出现年度下跌
item.description: The dollar edger higher on Friday but is set to end 2023 with its first yearly loss since 2020 against the euro and a basket of currencies, on expectations the U.S. Federal Reserve will begin cutting rates next year as inflation moderates.翻译:美元周五小幅走高，但由于预计随着通胀放缓，美联储明年将开始降息，美元兑欧元和一篮子货币将在 2023 年结束时出现自 2020 年以来的首次年度下跌。
item.author: Karen Brettell, Samuel Indyk

item.title: 随着智能手机激增，华为预计 2023 年收入增长 9%
item.description: Chinese tech giant Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) expects to report revenue exceeding 700 billion yuan ($98.5 billion) for 2023, according to comments from rotating chairman Ken Hu in an internal new year message seen by Reuters.翻译:路透社看到，轮值董事长胡厚昆在内部新年致辞中表示，中国科技巨头华为技术有限公司 (HWT.UL) 预计 2023 年收入将超过 7000 亿元人民币（985 亿美元）。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 香港流亡活动人士称，当局收钱让他提供线人
item.description: The former leader of a Hong Kong pro-independence group says he received up to HK$3,000 ($384) from security officers per meeting to become an informant when he was released from jail in June, before he fled to Britain and sought political asylum.翻译:香港独立派前领导人表示，6月份出狱后，他每次会面都会从安全人员处获得高达3000港元（合384美元）的报酬，以成为一名线人，随后他逃往英国并寻求政治庇护。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 财新网原央行官员因受贿罪获刑16年
item.description: A former Chinese central bank official has been sentenced to 16 years and six months in prison for taking bribes, leaking state secrets and insider trading as the ruling Communist Party tightens its grip on the financial sector.翻译:随着执政的共产党加强对金融业的控制，一名前中国央行官员因受贿、泄露国家机密和内幕交易被判处 16 年零 6 个月的监禁。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 会谈取得突破性进展后，中国军方猛烈抨击美国
item.description: China's defence ministry lashed out at the United States on Thursday, a week after their top military officials resumed high-level talks, criticising its continued meddling in the Asia Pacific region and saying it maintained a "Cold War" mindset.翻译:周四，在中美两国高级军事官员恢复高层会谈一周后，中国国防部猛烈抨击美国，批评美国继续干涉亚太地区，并称其保持“冷战”思维。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 中国计划到2025年建造全球一半以上的清洁燃料船舶
item.description: China has set itself the goal of producing more than half of the world's ships powered by cleaner fuels by 2025, in guidelines published by the industry ministry on Thursday.翻译:工业部周四发布的指导方针中，中国设定了到2025年生产全球一半以上使用清洁燃料的船舶的目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国表示不会对菲律宾一再“挑衅”视而不见
item.description: China on Thursday said it will not turn a blind eye to repeated "provocations and harassment" by the Philippines, amid heightened tensions over a spate of run-ins in the South China Sea.翻译:中国周四表示，在南海一系列冲突导致紧张局势加剧之际，中国不会对菲律宾一再的“挑衅和骚扰”视而不见。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 中国致力于扩大内需，确保经济快速复苏
item.description: China will strive to expand domestic demand, ensure a speedy economic recovery and promote stable growth, according to an interim report on China's 14th five-year plan published by parliament on Wednesday.翻译:全国人大周三公布的“十四五”规划中期报告指出，中国将努力扩大内需，确保经济快速复苏、促进稳定增长。
item.author: Reuters
